Name: Hotel Ofelias Hotel 4* Sup
Address: Llançà, 24, Eixample, 08015 Barcelona, Spain
Facilities:
nius discount at Ofelias Hotel 4* Sup! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Set just off Gran Vía and a 2-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Fira Exhibition Center, Ofelias Hotel offers stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi. It features a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool.
Each bright, air-conditioned room at Ofelias Hotel has a flat-screen TV. Each one comes with a private bathroom. A free bottle of water is provided upon arrival.
The hotel has an on-site bar where you can get a drink. There is a range of cafes and bars around Plaza Espanya. Restaurants can be found on Las Ramblas and in the Gothic Quarter, just 4 Metro stops away.
Staff at the reception can give you information about different Slow Travel activities .These include free bicycles on request, allowing you to discover hidden places and enjoy local cultures. .
The Magic Fountains and Montjuïc Park are less than 0.6 mi from the Ofelias, and Las Arenas Shopping center is just opposite the hotel. The airport bus stops just 200 yards from the hotel. Bicycle rental is available on request from reception.
This is our guests' favorite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.
Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.0 for a two-person trip.
We speak your language!

Name: Hotel URH Excelsior
Address: Passeig Verdaguer, 16, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Spain
Facilities:
ret de Mar – Excellent location – show map
This design hotel has a rooftop overlooking the palm-lined Lloret Beach. It offers stylish rooms with a private terrace, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.
The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Excelsior feature minimalist design. They have tiled floors and modern furniture, and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. All rooms have at least partial sea views.
The hotel has a café where breakfast is served from 8:00 to 10:30. The restaurant has a terrace with views over the promenade.
Reception is open 24 hours a day and is manned by friendly staff.
The Excelsior is just 200 yards from the Gothic San Romà Church, which features colorful roof tiles. Lloret Beach is just 20 yards away. You can drive to Girona Airport in 30 minutes, and central Barcelona is an hour away.

trava Bridge on the River Nervión, this city-center hotel is 800 yards from Bilbao’s world-famous Guggenheim Museum. Hotel Conde Duque Bilbao offers a restaurant and a cocktail bar. Guests have free access to the fitness center and sauna. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.
The modern rooms feature a Smart TV with screen mirroring and central heating and air conditioning. A coffee maker is available upon request. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, magnifying mirror, bath or shower, and hairdryer.

Name: Guesthouse Hostal Restaurante San Poul
Address: Avenida Alcázar de San Juan, 50, 45700 Consuegra, Spain
Facilities:
nius discount at Hostal Restaurante San Poul! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Hostal Restaurante San Poul is located in the medieval village of Consuegra, 41 mi from Toledo. It offers a 24-hour reception, rooms with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi throughout.
The onsite restaurant and cafeteria offer traditional dishes made with local produce. There is a daily set menu, a la carte dishes and a seasonal medieval tapas tasting menu. Packed lunches are available.
Rooms at the San Poul guest house feature functional décor and come with heating, a TV and a private bathroom with bath.
Consuegra is famous for its 12 windmills and its castle, located 10 minutes’ walk from Hostal Restaurante San Poul. Free parking is possible nearby.
